textContent:
All my life I've had major trust issues and you're the only person who has been able to gain my trust to this extent and made me believe in love! The kind of love which makes me feel at ease! And that too despite the distance between us. ğŸ¤§ğŸ¥º 

You've always been honest about your feelings without any fail and I'd be an idiot if I refuse to admit that this too has been a reason why I can't stop loving you more and more by each passing day.ğŸ¥ºğŸ©·
